info.name: KARIM LMS
info.description: Postman collection to test all routes in the Node.js/Express/Sequelize system, including user management, OTP flows, group operations, company operations, and authentication for withPassword and passwordLess flows.

request.description: Logs in an admin user. Replace email/password with valid credentials. Save 'access_token' as {{admin_jwt}} and 'refresh_token' as {{refresh_token}}.

exec: pm.test('Response has tokens and user', function () {

request.description: Refreshes access token. Save new 'access_token' as {{admin_jwt}}.
Logs out user by revoking refresh token. Check Tokens table for removal.
Creates a company. Save 'id' as {{company_id}}.
Gets all companies with filtering and pagination.
Gets a company by ID.
Updates a company.
Deletes a company.
Creates a user with sign_in_type 'withPassword'. Save 'user.id' as {{user_id_with_password}} and check email for OTP.
Creates a user with sign_in_type 'passwordLess'. Save 'user.id' as {{user_id_passwordless}} and check email for OTP.
Bulk creates users. Check email for OTPs.
Gets all users with filtering and pagination.
Gets user statistics.
Gets the current user's permissions.
Gets users by role.
Gets user by email.
Gets user by ID.
Checks if user exists.
Gets groups for a user.
Updates a user.
Toggles user active status.
Deletes a user.
Verifies OTP for withPassword user. Replace {{otp_with_password}} with received OTP.
Sets password for withPassword user. Replace {{otp_with_password}} with a new OTP if expired.
Requests OTP for passwordLess login. Check email for OTP.
Verifies OTP for passwordLess login. Save 'token' as {{user_jwt}}.
Resends OTP for a user. Check email for new OTP.
Retrieves all courses with optional filtering and pagination. Requires LIST_COURSES permission.

query.description: Search for courses with 'JavaScript' in title
Search for courses with 'programming' in description

request.description: Example of filtered course search with title and description filters.
Retrieves a specific course by ID with creator information. Requires VIEW_COURSE permission.
Creates a new course. Only admins can create courses. The createdBy field is automatically set to the authenticated user. Save the returned course 'id' as {{course_id}}.
Creates a course with only required fields (title). Description is optional.
Updates an existing course. Only the course creator or admin can update. Both title and description are optional in the request body.
Example of partial update - only updating description.
Deletes a course. Only the course creator or admin can delete.
Checks if a course exists by ID. Returns { exists: true/false }. Requires VIEW_COURSE permission.
Gets courses created by the authenticated user. Only admins can create courses, so this is admin-only.

body.raw:
{
    "title": "New Bundle two",
    "description": "A test bundle three",
    "category": "Development",
    "bundleType": "Simulated Phishing & Security Awareness Training",
    "seatPrice": 99.99,
    "courseIds": [
        "a3acd8bd-f7a5-4f18-9bf0-95688c85e720",
        "4d6ac756-e5a7-4241-beff-cd7f18524638"
    ]
}

{
    "courseId": "{{course_id}}",
    "name": "Phishing Simulation 1",
    "template": "Urgent: Verify Your Account",
    "url": "https://example.com/phishing",
    "page": "<html><body>Fake login page</body></html>",
    "smtp": "smtp://smtp.example.com:587"
}

{"name": "Updated Phishing Simulation", "template": {"subject": "Urgent: Account Verification Required", "body": "Please click the link to verify."}, "url": "https://example.com/updated-phishing", "page": "<html><body>Updated fake login page</body></html>", "smtp": "smtp://smtp.example.com:587"}

item.name: Get Schedule Attack Simulation by ID

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Immediate Phishing Campaign",
  "groupIds": ["{{groupId1}}"],
  "bundleId": "{{bundleId}}",
  "campaignType": "Simulated Phishing & Security Awareness Training",
  "launchStatus": "Deliver Immediately",
  "timezone": "Asia/Karachi",
  "courseIds": ["{{course_id_1}}", "{{course_id_2}}"]
}

item.name: Manual Trigger: Process Attack Simulation Launches

body.raw:
{ "subject" : "Congratulations! Youve Completed Advance Training", "body": "

Congratulations on Your Achievement!

Dear Nigga Zubair,

Youve successfully completed the [module_name] module. Great job on advancing your cybersecurity skills!

View your progress or start your next module at LMS Dashboard.

Best regards,
The LMS Team
